mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.product_name AS "productName", a.product_code AS "productCode", a.product_desc AS "productDesc", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM auto_product a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.product_name LIKE '%'||#{productName}||'%' '%'+#{productName}+'%' concat('%',#{productName},'%')
AND a.product_desc LIKE '%'||#{productDesc}||'%' '%'+#{productDesc}+'%' concat('%',#{productDesc},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_product( product_name, product_code, product_desc, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{productName}, #{productCode}, #{productDesc}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_code = #{productCode}, product_desc = #{productDesc}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
